interpretation: The lying face emoji is a symbol of dishonesty and deceit. It represents someone who is not truthful and is likely to deceive others. This card suggests that you or someone around you may not be honest about something important. It may be time to confront this dishonesty and address the issue. Alternatively, it could be a warning to avoid people who are not truthful and cannot be trusted. The lying face card can also represent a need to be cautious in your communication with others. Be mindful of what you say and how you say it, as others may not be completely honest with you. Keywords associated with this card include deception, dishonesty, caution, and mistrust. In a reading, this card may indicate a need to be more aware of your surroundings and the people around you, as there may be some hidden agendas at play. It may also suggest that you need to be more honest with yourself and those around you.
